title.narrative: Central Yunnan Roads Development Project

description.narrative: The impact of the Project is a well functioning integrated road transport system in Yunnan Province, part of the GMS. To realize this impact, the Project will help the YPCD provide efficient, safe, and environmentally sustainable road transport system by lowering the cost of transport, relieving traffic congestion, and improving access in the project area. The Project will (i) reduce traffic accidents and vehicle operating costs; (ii) improve access within Yunnan Province, and facilitate the movement of goods and people between the PRC and GMS; (iii) provide additional transport capacity to accommodate growing traffic; and (iv) provide improved access to markets and social services in a poor area.

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally sustainable regional transport system is developed in the project area.

title.narrative: Project/Program Completion Report
Reports and Recommendations of the President
Expressway capacity is increased by 45,000 pcu per day for the Wuding-Fuming section.

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally sustainable regional transport system is developed in the project area.

title.narrative: Expressway capacity is increased by 50,000 pcu per day for Fuming-Kunming at opening.

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally sustainable regional transport system is developed in the project area.

title.narrative: Traffic volume on national highway 108 increased to 5,200 pcu in 2013.

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally sustainable regional transport system is developed in the project area.

title.narrative: Traffic volume on the expressway increased to 8,150 pcu in 2013.

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally sustainable regional transport system is developed in the project area.

title.narrative: Fuel savings of 6,000 tons in 2013.

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally sustainable regional transport system is developed in the project area.

title.narrative: Vehicle operating costs for a passenger car are reduced from CNY1.61 per vehicle-km without the Project to CNY1.37 with the Project in 2013

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally sustainable regional transport system is developed in the project area.

title.narrative: Travel time for the expressway is reduced by 1 hour.

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally sustainable regional transport system is developed in the project area.

title.narrative: Travel distance reduced from 84 to 64 km in 2013

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally sustainable regional transport system is developed in the project area.

title.narrative: Corporate governance and efficiency improved by (i) obtaining autonomy in operation and management, and (ii) appointing an external auditor to audit WKEC's financial reports annually

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally sustainable regional transport system is developed in the project area.

title.narrative: Public-private partnership in toll road development is facilitated and additional private sector funds are raised by 2015

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally sustainable regional transport system is developed in the project area.
